recursive.tooltip: Search in all subfolders of the selected directory

logging.tooltip: Save search results and operations to log files

match_structure.tooltip: Maintain the same folder structure in output directories as in the source

or_subfolders.tooltip: Create separate subfolders for each OR condition in the search term. Example: If searching for 'blue eyes || green eyes', matching files will be sorted into 'blue eyes' and 'green eyes' subfolders

search_positive.tooltip: Search within the positive prompt text of the image metadata

search_negative.tooltip: Search within the negative prompt text of the image metadata

case_sensitive.tooltip: Make the search case-sensitive (e.g. 'Cat' won't match 'cat')

tooltips.folder_path: Select the folder containing images to search
tooltips.search_term: Enter search terms. Use && for AND, || for OR, * for wildcard
tooltips.ignore_term: Exclude files containing specific terms. Use && for AND, || for OR, * for wildcard
tooltips.copy_to: Copy matching files to this folder
tooltips.move_to: Move matching files to this folder
tooltips.regex_filter: Use regular expression pattern to filter results (e.g. (?<!wo)man matches 'man' but not 'woman').

confirmations.move_message:
This will move all matching files from their original locations to the specified folder.

Are you sure you want to proceed?

warnings.no_terms: No valid search terms found after cleaning
